name: 有機化學實驗（一）
restrict: ◎限本系(含雙主修)修習 ◎必須先修過(也可以同時修)【CMU0179  有機化學實驗技術（一）】
description: 訓練學生有機化學實驗操作的技巧，並培養實驗正確的實驗態度以及獨立思考和解決問題能力。此外，如何使學生學習撰寫有機化學實驗記錄和報告亦是此課程重要一環。
goals: 訓練學生分析化學實驗操作的技巧
培養實驗正確的實驗態度以及獨立思考和解決問題能力
訓練學生分析化學實驗操作的技巧
syllabus:
Exp.1: Simple Distillation of Ethanol Compound

Exp.2: Extraction: Separation of C6H5COOH & C6H5NHCOCH3 (detecting MP)

Exp.3: Chromatography: 1. TLC Synthesis α-methylbenzyl alcohol from Acetophenone

Exp.4: Chromatography: 2. FC (detecting HPLC) Purification of α-methylbenzyl alcohol

Exp.5: Test for Hydrocarbons:1. Sulfuric Acid Test 2. Bromine Test 3. Baeyer Test

Exp.6: A.Test for Alkyl Halides: 1.Alcoholic Silver Nitrate 2.Sodium Iodide in Acetone

B. Preparation of _tert_\-Butyl Chloride

Exp.7: Artificial Sweeteners: Preparation of _p_\-Ethoxyphenylurea (Dulcin) by Urea Method(detecting MP)

Exp.8: The Gelation of Polyvinyl Alcohol with Borax

Exp.9: Preparation of DL-phenylglycine:Optical Resolution of DL-phenylgiycine with (1_S_)-(+)-camphor-10\-sulfonic acid

grading.note: 含值日生工作及實驗態度

prerequisite: ◎必須先修過(也可以同時修)【CMU0179  有機化學實驗技術（一）】
